title: Phio Pharmaceuticals Corp (PHIO-Q) Quote - Press Release
author: Unknown
description: Detailed price information for Phio Pharmaceuticals Corp (PHIO-Q) from The Globe and Mail including charting and trades.
cleaned_text: Data is being presented at 2023 American Society of Gene and Cell Therapy (ASGCT) Annual Meeting MARLBOROUGH, Mass., May 18, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- Phio Pharmaceuticals Corp. (Nasdaq: [PHIO](#financial-modal)), a clinical stage biotechnology company whose proprietary INTASYL RNAi platform technology is designed to make immune cells more effective in killing tumor cells, today announced pre-clinical data demonstrating that using INTASYL to silence TIGIT and CBL-B may be used to improve the anti-tumor response of NK cells, creating a more effective cell therapy for treating cancer.
